message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.NI 

The paper discusses the emergence of action and selection for stimulation avoidance in spiking neural networks through STDP, which is a common topic in the field of neural networks and machine learning (cs.NE). The paper also discusses predictive coding, which is a technique used in machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG, cs.AI). The study involves the use of spiking neural networks, which are commonly used in the field of systems and control (cs.SY) and neuroscience (cs.NI).
